steps.title: No—Hinge does not have read receipts.
steps.content: No—Hinge does not have read receipts. You won't be able to see if others have read your messages, and others will not be able to see when you have read their messages. Hinge will only confirm if the message was delivered. Hinge conversations that are inactive for 14 days are archived into a Hidden Chats section. You can use Your Turn to send your recipient a reminder to respond. You can also check a potential match's Last Active status as long as you and the recipient have it enabled. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Match with a user.
steps.content: Match with a user. You'll be able to see if a Hinge user likes your photo or prompt. Click the notification to bring up the Match window. [2] X Research source Click Match with to complete the match. A new window will pop up.

steps.title: Click Add a reply.
steps.content: Click Add a reply . You'll need to start a conversation on Hinge . You can use some of the best Hinge openers to grab your match's attention. Alternatively, you can click Make it their turn right away to invite them to send the first message.

steps.title: Give the recipient time to respond.
steps.content: Give the recipient time to respond. Responses depend on the recipient. They can have other responsibilities, events, or they may have forgotten. You can proceed whenever you'd like, but it's recommended to give them ample time to respond.

steps.title: Select the user from your "Matches".
steps.content: Select the user from your "Matches". You can find your Matches tab located on the bottom of the screen, indicated by a purple text box icon. [3] X Research source

steps.title: On the user's chatlog, click ••• .
steps.content: On the user's chatlog, click ••• . You can find this at the top right corner.

steps.title: Click Invite to Chat.
steps.content: Click Invite to Chat . In the chat log, you will see You invited (name) to start the chat . The recipient will receive a notification of your chat invitation. This does not guarantee you will receive a response. This only reminds the recipient that there is a message waiting for them.

steps.title: Open the Hinge app and tap the "Photo" icon.
steps.content: Open the Hinge app and tap the "Photo" icon. This is located on the far right of the navigation bar. [4] X Research source You will only be able to check the Last Active status for potential matches. You will not be able to see the activity status for current matches.

steps.title: Find the "Show Last Active Status" section.
steps.content: Find the "Show Last Active Status" section.

steps.title: Activate your "Last Active status" by tapping the toggle.
steps.content: Activate your "Last Active status" by tapping the toggle. It will turn purple. [5] X Research source You need to have this feature activated to see someone else's Last Active status . If you want to disable this feature, tap the toggle so it turns gray.

steps.title: Click x to save your changes.
steps.content: Click x to save your changes. Your Last Active status will only be visible to Hinge members when viewing your profile in Discover, in Standouts, or on the Likes You tab.

steps.title: Navigate to a potential match to view their Last Active status.
steps.content: Navigate to a potential match to view their Last Active status. You will be able to see if a user is Active Now or Active Today . You won't be able to see the Last Active status if the user has it hidden, or if they have not been Active on the app within the past day.

steps.title: Tinder.
steps.content: Tinder. Tinder offers Read Receipts as a paid feature. You can purchase Read Receipts in packages of 5, 10, or 20. [6] X Research source You will not be able to use Read Receipts without paying for them. This will only work with matches who have Read Receipts turned on. If your match has Read Receipts on turned off, your Read Receipt count will be unused.

steps.title: Other Read Receipt apps.
steps.content: Other Read Receipt apps. If Read Receipts are important to you, consider moving the conversation from Hinge to one of these apps: WhatsApp Instagram Snapchat Messages on iOS
